SilverStringedLute.NAME: Silver-Stringed Lute
SilverStringedLute.FLAVOR: The Silver-Stringed Lute is said to have been brought to the Spire from the faerie realm.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each battle and whenever you play a #yChord, gain 1 Strength and 1 Dexterity.

PerformersMotley.NAME: Performer's Motley
PerformersMotley.FLAVOR: A coat made up of a wide variety of colours, designed to make the wearer appear harmless.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you gain a buff or debuff, gain 2 Block.

RoughRuff.NAME: Rough Ruff
RoughRuff.FLAVOR: A spiked ruff worn around the neck. It makes you look much fancier.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you enter a rest site, gain 10 gold for each #yStory in your deck.

SneckoCharmersFlute.NAME: Snecko Charmer's Flute
SneckoCharmersFlute.FLAVOR: A flute for charming sneckoes. It works on other creatures, too.

CourtesansHarp.NAME: Courtesan's Harp
CourtesansHarp.FLAVOR: A fancy harp made from gold and jewels. Its gentle tones seem out of place here in the Spire.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever your #yScale reaches a multiple of 5, draw a card.

BearPuppet.NAME: Bear Puppet
BearPuppet.FLAVOR: A hand puppet made from a real tiny bear. It makes your magic much fiercer.
DESCRIPTIONS: You need 3 less Puppet for it to activate.

FeatheredCap.NAME: Feathered Cap
FeatheredCap.FLAVOR: Someone has earned a feather in their cap, it seems. You don't think it was you...?
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each battle, add a #yStory card to your hand.

BrokenLuteString.NAME: Broken Lute String
BrokenLuteString.FLAVOR: A broken string from a lute, a memento from a famous performance.
DESCRIPTIONS: Chords complete with one fewer note.

BookOfLimericks.NAME: Book of Limericks
BookOfLimericks.FLAVOR: There once was a bard in the Spire NL Whose songs he thought would inspire NL First day on the job NL Chased by Gremlin Nob NL And Hexaghost set him on fire.
DESCRIPTIONS: During non-Boss, non-Elite combats, gain Energy at the start of your turn.
